import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { faNode, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import './index.scss' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { (async () => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) })(); }, []) return ( <>

I'm a sopphomore at the Johns Hopkins University Whiting School of Engineering majoring in Computer Science and Applied Mathematics & Statistics.

As an aspiring software engineer, I am looking for an internship position in a company of any size, where I can work on challenging and diverse projects while applying latest technologies.

Three of my strengths are that I am a natural/perpetual learner, very detail(and object) oriented, and an effective communicator.

) } export default About
